page.title: 17Industry in the area
page.content: The large Birds Eye factory has specialised in frozen foods, particularly peas from local farms, since the late 1940s. Many activities have been concentrated of late at the Lowestoft factory, and the Yarmouth works is under threat of closure. A port related industry is the manufacture of egg cartons and other moulded items at Omnipack, formerly Hartmann Fibre. Although local waste paper is often used for pulping most production comes from imported wood pulp. A major light industry is the Standard Telephone & Cable (STC) factory, formerly Erie Resistor, which makes electrical and electronic components.
